<?php
{{#each realms}}
$realms['{{realmName}}']['name'] = '{{realm}}';
$realms['{{realmName}}']['namespace'] = '{{namespace}}';
$realms['{{realmName}}']['primaryDatastore'] = '{{primaryDatastoreName}}';
$realms['{{realmName}}']['driver'] = '{{driver}}';
$realms['{{realmName}}']['tableNames'] = [{{#each tables}}'{{tableName}}', {{/each}}];
{{#if driverIsElasticsearch}}
$realms['{{realmName}}']['default_analyzer'] = '{{default_analyzer}}';
$realms['{{realmName}}']['shards'] = '{{shards}}';
$realms['{{realmName}}']['replicas'] = '{{replicas}}';
{{/if}}

    {{#each tables}}
        $realms['{{realmName}}']['{{tableName}}']['name'] = '{{tableName}}';
        $realms['{{realmName}}']['{{tableName}}']['realmName'] = '{{realmName}}';
        $realms['{{realmName}}']['{{tableName}}']['objectName'] = '{{objectName}}';
        $realms['{{realmName}}']['{{tableName}}']['collectionName'] = '{{collectionName}}';
        $realms['{{realmName}}']['{{tableName}}']['primaryDatastoreName'] = '{{primaryDatastoreName}}';
        $realms['{{realmName}}']['{{tableName}}']['primaryKeyFieldNames'] = {{{primaryKeyFieldNamesString}}};
        $realms['{{realmName}}']['{{tableName}}']['primaryKeyPropertyNames'] = {{{primaryKeyPropertyNamesString}}};
        $realms['{{realmName}}']['{{tableName}}']['autoIncrementField'] = '{{autoIncrementField}}';
        $realms['{{realmName}}']['{{tableName}}']['autoIncrementProperty'] = '{{autoIncrementProperty}}';
        $realms['{{realmName}}']['{{tableName}}']['autoGenerateField'] = '{{autoGenerateField}}';
        $realms['{{realmName}}']['{{tableName}}']['autoGenerateProperty'] = '{{autoGenerateProperty}}';
        $realms['{{realmName}}']['{{tableName}}']['fieldNames'] = {{{fieldNamesString}}};
        $realms['{{realmName}}']['{{tableName}}']['propertyNames'] = {{{propertyNamesString}}};
        $realms['{{realmName}}']['{{tableName}}']['fieldTypes'] = {{{fieldTypesString}}};

        $classes['{{objectName}}']['realmName'] = '{{realmName}}';
        $classes['{{objectName}}']['tableName'] = '{{tableName}}';
        $classes['{{objectName}}']['primary_datastore'] = '{{primaryDatastoreName}}';
        $classes['{{collectionName}}']['realmName'] = '{{realmName}}';
        $classes['{{collectionName}}']['tableName'] = '{{tableName}}';
        $classes['{{collectionName}}']['primary_datastore'] = '{{primaryDatastoreName}}';

    {{/each}}

{{/each}}
